resources.string: Sonaar
Next
I accept
Exit
Start using SONAAR

By using SONAAR, you are agreeing to allow SONAAR to collect the text descriptions of the images that you tweet on Twitter or post on Facebook. SONAAR does not collect any identifying information, only the image and the text description.
Access denied! In order to send the screenshot to our database, SONAAR needs access to your gallery of images.
In order to send the screenshot to our database, SONAAR needs access to your gallery of images. SONAAR will ask for that permission next.
SONAAR is a service that helps you create accessible content on you social networks (currently supported social networks are Twitter and Facebook)
When SONAAR detects that you are tweeting or posting an image, you will receive a notification with a proposed text description of the image that you can use in your tweet or post.

To be able to achieve this, SONAAR needs to take a screenshot of your phone, crop it to the image size and send it to our server. There we search for the image. If we already have it we don\'t even store it, but we will be able to send you any descriptions we have stored. If we don\'t have it, we store it, generate a description and send it to you. When you complete your post or tweet we store any description you created so that it can help other users in the future.
By clicking \"I Accept\", you are agreeing with this collection
consent
uuid
Settings
Settings
SONAAR detected that you are posting a image to %1$s. A possible altText to your image is: %2$s. Please consider add it to your image post. %3$s
To do so click on the +Alt button.
To add an altTex to your post, click on the +Alt button.
To do so publish the image, then open it and click on the more button (3 dot button) and select "Edit alt text".
To add an altTex to your post, publish the image, and then open it and click on the more button (3 dot button) and select "Edit alt text".
SONAAR found a possible altText to your image: %1$s
SONAAR could not find an altText, but automatically generated some concepts about the image: %1$s
SONAAR detected that you are posting a image to %1$s. We could not find an altText, but automatically generated some concepts about the image: %2$s. %3$s
Please start or restart the SONAAR service on the accessibility settings menu.
SONAAR is already active.
Go to accessibility settings
